name: Portfolio template - Edit and export HTML
description:
Get your own online portfolio within a few clicks!

https://portfolio-template.animaapp.io/


Easy to use template

- Customize your page in Figma

- Override the text, screenshots and styles

- Go live in minutes


Publish a website in minutes, in various ways:

- Export HTML/React/Vue code

- Connect your domain

- Get a public link under animaapp.io


Features highlights

- Responsive websites: Figma constraints are supported.

- Breakpoints (Media queries): When opening from mobile or desktop, users will always get to the right artboard. 

- Videos: Add Youtube/MP4/GIF/Lottie to your site.

- Embed HTML: Google maps, Analytics pixels, HubSpot forms, and any code in HTML/JS/CSS.
